in.robotix.xantsclient
Class XantActionProxy

java.lang.Object
  in.robotix.xantsclient.XantActionProxy

public class XantActionProxy
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used by the client code to encode the Xant instructions to be sent to the server side through the socket connection. The client code does this by calling various methods of this class an through an instance of the same that is passed to it. One place to so would be inside the XantClient.nextCycle(XantActionProxy) method. 

 // atHome, isReturning and foundFood are pre-declared boolean variables
 
 	if (proxy.isDead()) {
 	return;
 	}
 	if (atHome) {
 		proxy.dropEnergy();
 		return;
 	}
 	if (foundFood) {
 		foundFood = false;
 		isReturning = true;
 		proxy.pickEnergy();
 		return;
 	}

Constructor Detail

XantActionProxy

public XantActionProxy()
Method Detail

connect

public boolean connect(int port)
Called to connect the application to the simulator using sockets. The participant coding his program logic need not worry about calling this method.

Parameters:
port - The port to which the client code must connect to.
Returns:
true if the connection was established successfully and false otherwise.

disconnect

public void disconnect()
                throws java.io.IOException
Called to decouple the sockets. The participant need to worry about this method.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - Simply relays the exceptions generated by the socket classes.

endCycle

public void endCycle()
Called to signify the end of one cycle of execution. The participant need not worry about calling this method.

getBroadcast

public java.lang.String getBroadcast()
Returns the current broadcast by the Xween. Participants must call this method to receive the text broadcasted by the Xween in the cycle after the one in which they generated the request.

Returns:
A String containing the current broadcast returned by the simulator if a valid request for a broadcast was issued in the previous cycle. A null otherwise.

getCurrentEnergy

public int getCurrentEnergy()
Returns the amount of energy the Xant is currently carrying.

Returns:
The amount of energy the Xant is currently carrying. Returns -1 if the current simulation cycle is not a normal cycle.

getCycleType

public int getCycleType()
Returns the 'type' of the execution cycle. Execution cycles may of three types.
  1. DEAD_CYCLE: If the Xant is dead. An Xant dead is a particular cycle is guaranteed to be dead in all other subsequent cycles.
  2. BROADCAST_CYCLE: If the Xant sent a (valid) request for an access to the Xween's current broadcast.
  3. NORMAL_CYCLE: None of the above. There is nothing special about this particular cycle.

Returns:
An integer equal in value to one of the constants mentioned above.

getMatrix

public FlatMatrix getMatrix(java.lang.String matrix)
Returns a particular matrix associated with this Xant.

Returns:
null if either the matrix does not exist or this is not a normal cycle. Otherwise an instance of a FlatMatrix class, representing the matrix information. Please note that the names of the matrices have been stored as constants, which may directly be used. The constants are SMELL_MATRIX, NEIGHBOUR_MATRIX, HOME_MATRIX, TRAIL_MATRIX, OBSTACLE_MATRIX and ENERGY_MATRIX.

interpretString

public void interpretString(java.lang.String text)
Called to parse a string returned sent by the core. Participants need not worry about calling this function.

isDead

public boolean isDead()
Returns true if the Xant in context is dead.

markCell

public void markCell()
The participant calls this function to mark the current cell.

moveEast

public void moveEast()
Participants call this method to try to move the Xant one unit toward the East.

moveNorth

public void moveNorth()
Participants call this method to try to move the Xant one unit toward the North.

moveSouth

public void moveSouth()
Participants call this method to try to move the Xant one unit toward the South.

moveWest

public void moveWest()
Participants call this method to try to move the Xant one unit toward the West.

readBroadcast

public void readBroadcast()
Participants call this method to request for the current information being broadcasted by the Xween. The information may later be extracted by calling the function getBroadcast().

pickEnergy

public void pickEnergy()
Participants call this method to get the Xant to pick one packet of energy from the current cell.

dropEnergy

public void dropEnergy()
Participants call this method to get the Xant to drop one packet of energy onto the current cell.

sendHint

public void sendHint(java.lang.String hint)
Tries to send a hint to the Xween.

Parameters:
hint - The hint to be sent.

startCycle

public void startCycle()
Called to start a cycle. The participant need not worry about calling this method.
